channel.title: [718] Spawn anything! Pharaoh Pkz
channel.description:
Pharoah Pkz is a 718 Matrix sourced server where Item spawning is enabled! For every item! You may pk, go bossing, or just chill! I have enabled dicing for everyone! You may even gamble (Dicing), but without the risk of loosing your hard earned items! I will be giving out free donator ranks and staff positions! First player gets mod! Next 3 get Extreme Donator, 2 After that get normal donator! Donators can use Imbued rings, Torva and rares!
I have enabled item spawning on this server because I don't see many servers where they let you spawn whatever you want, and just have fun. I thought it would be a good idea to let players just fool around with unlimited items, and just practice pking skills!
No website because it's not really needed for a spawn server.
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/mfwbgomh5n1llo0/Pharaoh+Pkz.jar
Keep in mind this server was created for you to have fun! Not for money or kind of benefit at all!
Screenshots:
http://gyazo.com/7b3ced9f430f5f79423e2701bb2d19f2
http://gyazo.com/5088df6a4a60061cc886dcf448cdf162
http://gyazo.com/1e8cc4aaf930e968782f07c0058ea62d

item.title: [718] Spawn anything! Pharaoh Pkz
item.dc:creator: @ImJaws ImJaws
item.description:
@ImJaws wrote:

Probably the worst advertisement ever.

Giving people that join mod is the most stupid thing I’ve ever seen.

Read full topic
